Put Some Gas on it at Lake Cecebe: Ontario Lakes Project

24 Aug 2012


There are many different theories about the best way to light a campfire, some more technical than others. This instructional video on building a campfire filmed at Lake Cecebe in the Parry Sound District is most certainly the most fool proof method I’ve ever seen. Â Ironically, it might be one of the more foolish things I’ve ever seen.

It opens with the line “How much gas is too much gas?” and goes downhill from there. Enjoy, and please don’t try this at home.
